content:
The frames and frame elements in the given sentence are:

Frames:

1. Event
2. Calendric\_unit
3. Part\_whole

Frame elements:

1. Event:
	* Event: "what"
	* Place: "on the Kherson front"
	* Time: "in the second half of August"
2. Calendric\_unit:
	* Unit: "half"
	* Whole: "of August"
3. Part\_whole:
	* Part\_prop: "second"
	* Part: "half"
	* Whole: "of August"
